channel.title: m3u8 on Developer Playground
channel.description: Recent content in m3u8 on Developer Playground

item.title: HLS 스트리밍
item.description: Step 1. 동영상 분할을 위한 FFmpeg 4.x 설치 $ apt-get install software-properties-common $ add-apt-repository ppa:jonathonf/ffmpeg-4 $ apt install ffmpeg $ ffmpeg -version $ apt install libfaac-dev Step 2. 동영상 분할 $ ffmpeg -i sample.
